title: SCO_Xenix_386_and_Extras.rar
description:
SCO Xenix 386 2.3.4 with all available add on packages
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
General Information
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disc type...................: Various
Program platform............: 386
Program category............: OS Abandonware
Image is 'cracked'?.........: No
# of discs..................: Many
Serial number...............: all serials and activation keys in appropriate packages
Release date................: July 2013
Image creation application..: dd

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------Compression Information
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compression format..........: RAR (with multiple formated sub dirs)
# of parts..................: 1
Filename....................: SCO_Xenix386_and_extras.rar
Size of each part...........: n/a
Total compressed size.......: 
SFV Filename or CRC Checksum: n/a

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
All images have been successfully installed into a working Xenix 386 installation
under QEMU 1.5.1 under Xubuntu 13.04. All should be able to be burned to media 
and installed on hardware as desired. 

Instructions on using these packages in QEMU can be found here: <a href="
http://virtuallyfun.superglobalmegacorp.com/?p=413" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://virtuallyfun.superglobalmegacorp.com/?p=413</a>

Documentation for Xenix can be downloaded here:  <a href="
http://www.tenox.tc/docs/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.tenox.tc/docs/</a> <a href="
http://bitsavers.trailing-edge.com/pdf/sco/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bitsavers.trailing-edge.com/pdf/sco/</a>

This package contains:

Xenix Runtime System 2.3.4 
Development System(386) 2.3.0
GCC 1.40 & 2.5.8 with Make 3.68
CGI 1.1.0 
Text Processing 2.3.0 
Manual Pages 2.3.0
VP/ix 1.2.0 vpix
TCP/IP Runtime 1.2.0 
Streams Runtime 1.0.0 
MS Word 5.1.1 for Xenix 
MS Multiplan 2.201 for Xenix
MS Pascal Compiler for Xenix
MS Basic for Xenix
SCO FoxPro+ for Xenix
SCO Office Portfolio (Lyrix, Professional, Integra)
Microfocus VS Cobol 1.2
SCO Games 
SCO Public Domain Supplement
SLS patches including xnx427d Y2k patches
Miscellaneous ported software from internet repositories
Precompiled copy of the MGR windowing system from Bellcore. This runs on VGA with a serial mouse. In theory a bus mouse or a PS/2 (aka "keyboard mouse") mouse will work as well. su to root then at the top of the distribution edit the makefile as desired and type "make installasroot". 
XenixSerials.txt - there may be errors in these. 

Enjoy!
